info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 1:54PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A THUNDERSTORM WITH INTENSE LIGHTNING WILL IMPACT CENTRAL ABBEVILLE COUNTY UNTIL 230 PM EDT... At 153 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm with intense lightning 13 miles west of Abbeville, or near Calhoun Falls, moving northeast at 25 mph. Locations to be impacted include... Calhoun Falls, Due West, Lake Secession, Lowndesville, Lake Russell and Antreville.
info.instruction: Frequent lightning is occurring with this storm. If outdoors, try to get indoors or into a hard topped vehicle. Otherwise, stay away from open areas and isolated high objects such as trees. When indoors, stay away from windows and doors and avoid using wired electronic devices. Do not take a shower or bath. Try to unplug unnecessary appliances before the storm approaches.
